predictit.models.statsmodels_autoregressive module¶

predictit.models.statsmodels_autoregressive.predict(data, model, predicts=7)[source]¶

Function that creates predictions from trained model and input data.

Parameters

  • data (np.ndarray) – Time series data

  • model (list, class) – Trained model. It can be list of neural weigths or it can be fitted model class from imported library.

  • predicts (int, optional) – Number of predicted values. Defaults to 7.

Returns

Array of predicted results

Return type

np.ndarray

predictit.models.statsmodels_autoregressive.train(data, used_model='autoreg', p=5, d=1, q=0, cov_type='nonrobust', method='cmle', ic='aic', trend='nc', solver='lbfgs', seasonal=(1, 1, 1, 24), enforce_invertibility=False, enforce_stationarity=False)[source]¶

Autoregressive model from statsmodels library. Only univariate data. :param data: Time series data. :type data: np.ndarray :param predicts: Number of predicted values. Defaults to 7. :type predicts: int, optional :param plot: Whether plot results. Defaults to 0. :type plot: int, optional :param predicted_column_index: If multidimensional, define what column is predicted. Defaults to 0. :type predicted_column_index: int, optional :param method: Parameter of statsmodels fit function. Defaults to ‘cmle’. :type method: str, optional :param ic: Parameter of statsmodels fit function. Defaults to ‘aic’. :type ic: str, optional :param trend: Parameter of statsmodels fit function. Defaults to ‘nc’. :type trend: str, optional :param solver: ort statsmodels.api as sm :type solver: str, optional

File “/home/dan/.local/lib/pyt Parameter of statsmodels fit function. Defaults to ‘lbfgs’.

Returns

Predictions of input time series.

Return type

np.ndarray
